name: Rick Shaw's Radical Rickshaw
storyline:
In the peaceful coastal town of Del Luna, on the eve of the blood moon, all the townsfolk are on high alert for Rick Shaw and his fateful rickshaw.

You play as this frightful poltergeist who joins together the townsfolk and takes them for involuntary rickshaw rides across town.

However, if you don't drop them off at a spirit zone before your magic runs out, your powers will be depleted and your haunting will be through until the next blood moon.
summary: Grab townsfolk and transport them in this wild reimagining of crazy taxi.
